questionDisplayText: Who is the founder of Tally Solutions, the company behind Tally software?
In which year was the first version of Tally accounting software released?
What is the primary purpose of Tally in accounting?

options.optionText: To automate the entire accounting process
To record and manage financial transactions efficiently
To replace the need for human accountants
To provide legal and tax advice to businesses

questionDisplayText: How does Tally contribute to financial reporting in businesses?

options.optionText: It generates financial statements automatically with no user input.
It allows for the accurate and timely preparation of financial reports.
It replaces the need for financial reports altogether.
It only produces income statements, not balance sheets.

questionDisplayText: Why is Tally considered a valuable tool for accountants and financial professionals?

options.optionText: It replaces the need for financial professionals.
It enhances accuracy and reduces the risk of errors.
It offers investment advice and portfolio management.
It is primarily a communication platform for financial data.

questionDisplayText: Which of the following statements is true regarding data accessibility in Tally Prime and Tally.ERP 9?

options.optionText: Both Tally Prime and Tally.ERP 9 allow remote access to data.
Only Tally.ERP 9 supports remote data access.
Only Tally Prime supports remote data access.
Neither Tally Prime nor Tally.ERP 9 allows remote data access.

questionDisplayText: What significant feature does Tally Prime introduce to improve data security compared to Tally.ERP 9?

options.optionText: No data security features in Tally Prime

questionDisplayText: What is the primary reason for Tally Prime's introduction, despite the existence of Tally.ERP 9?

options.optionText: To offer a more affordable alternative for small businesses
To provide an updated, modernized version with enhanced features
To discontinue Tally.ERP 9 and transition users to Tally Prime
To cater exclusively to the cloud accounting market

questionDisplayText: Which is the authenticated website to download the installation file for Tally Prime?
The tally installation file needs to be installed on each system.
What is the primary purpose of accounting?
What is the purpose of double-entry accounting?

options.optionText: To ensure that all transactions are recorded twice
To reduce the risk of errors in recording transactions
To make financial statements more confusing

questionDisplayText: What is accounting primarily concerned with?

options.optionText: Recording, summarizing, and analyzing financial transactions

questionDisplayText: Which of the following best defines accounting?

options.optionText: Calculating taxes owed by a company
Keeping track of employee work hours
The process of measuring, processing, and communicating financial information about

questionDisplayText: What is accounting?

options.optionText: The process of making money for a business
The process of managing human resources
The process of recording, summarizing, and reporting financial transactions
The process of marketing products to consumers

questionDisplayText: Why is accounting important for businesses?

options.optionText: To keep track of employee attendance
To record financial transactions and monitor financial health

questionDisplayText: What is the main objective of financial accounting?

options.optionText: To communicate financial information to external parties

questionDisplayText: Which of the following is an example of a financial transaction that would be recorded in accounting?
What is the single-entry method of accounting primarily used for?
In single-entry accounting, how are financial transactions recorded?

options.optionText: Every transaction is recorded with both a debit and a credit entry
Only income and expenses are recorded, not assets and liabilities
Transactions are recorded in a single column, either as income or expense
Transactions are not recorded; only summaries are provided

options.optionText: When a company wants to increase its revenue
When a company wants to reduce its expenses

When a company wants to pay its suppliers

options.optionText: To maintain our stock at the third-party Godown

To maintain third-party stock at our location

questionDisplayText: __________ location is the default Godown, which gets auto-activated in Tally Prime Data.

the Track Expiry Date feature is auto-enabled
the stock category feature gets auto-enabled

options.optionText: Enable Cost Tracking is set to NO

questionDisplayText: Which of the following is not an inventory feature?

options.optionText: to achieve production on a large scale

options.optionText: Create a manufacturing voucher under the stock journal

options.optionText: Our stock with a third party

options.optionText: Our stock with a third party

options.optionText: A group of inventory items with similar attributes

options.optionText: While creating company data in Tally

options.optionText: Detailed data on inventory items by batch
